p: Antioxidant activity by FRAP method of ethanol leaves extract was evaluated by Dalar et al. as 611.00 ± 15.1 μmol Fe +2/g d.w. [ 39]. According to Malik et al. the FRAP assay results of methanol and ethanol leaves extracts of wild C. intybus were evaluated at 1254 ± 0.002 μmol Fe +2/g d.w. and 1049.73 ± 0.002 μmol Fe +2/g d.w. respectively [ 36].
